name: Rune_Blast
display_help: The Midnight Mystic can call upon the magical energies of this rune to delivery powerful blasts of magic.

name: Lift
display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Sands_of_Mu
display_help: The Ghoulish Mystics carry a mysterious magical sand with them, enabling to channel the power of the nether realms into a devastating flurry of blows.

name: Animate_Acolytes
display_help: The Ghoulish Mystic can animate an Acolyte to fight at his side.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Undead_Slaying_Axe
display_help: This undead Midnighter's Undead Slaying Axe still packs a potent punch even after its wielder's untimely demise.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Bonus vs True Undead

name: Blackwand
display_help: This undead Midnighter's Blackwand still packs a potent punch even after its wielder's untimely demise.

name: Damage_MN
display_help: The Midnight Masters are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_LT
display_help: The Midnight Masters are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_BS
display_help: The Midnight Masters are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_EB
display_help: The Midnight Masters are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_AV
display_help: The Midnight Masters are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Energy_Punch
display_help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Twilight_Grasp
display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate

name: Power_Push
display_help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback
